sections.heading: Administration of successions; procedureExcept as otherwise provided by law, all of the rules applicable to the judicial opening of a succession, its administration, and sending the heirs or legatees into possession on its termination apply to the small succession
sections.text: Administration of successions; procedureExcept as otherwise provided by law, all of the rules applicable to the judicial opening of a succession, its administration, and sending the heirs or legatees into possession on its termination apply to the small succession.
